    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elaborate Scroll Esoterica](/Feats.aspx?ID=3720) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 46

**Prerequisites**
[Scroll Esoterica](/Feats.aspx?ID=3713)

</column>

---

You've picked up more scraps of magic texts, improving your makeshift [scrolls](/Equipment.aspx?Category=15&Subcategory=52). In addition to your daily scrolls from Scroll Esoterica, add a scroll with a 3rd-level spell. At 14th level, add a scroll with a 4th-level spell. At 16th level, add a scroll with a 5th-level spell.

<title level="2">Elaborate Scroll Esoterica leads to...</title>
[Grand Scroll Esoterica](/Feats.aspx?ID=3730)
